ModMetaData.name: RJW Sexperience
ModMetaData.author: a
ModMetaData.description:
Original mod by moreorganstodump (a), updated for RJW 4.9 by c0ffee
This submod adds new stuff to RJW: - Sex skill - Lust stat - Cum as collectable resource, cum buckets and cum addiction - More sex records - Partner sex history, sex type statistics and UI to display these - Virgin trait - Bastard relation
Ideology content: - Memes: lewd, rapist, zoophile and necrophile memes - Rituals: consensual gangbang, rape gangbang, consensual animal gangbang, rape animal gangbang and drug orgy - Precepts: baby faction, bestiality, incest, necrophilia, rape, allowed sex type, social affection, submissive gender, virginity - HumpShroom bong and HumpShroom Autobong
